title: Who is 'Kokilaben' and why is her rap going viral years after the end of 'Saath Nibhana Saathiya'? - Quora

response.answer_text: The Kokilaben rap was shared on Mukhate's Instagram page. Mukhate, whose bio says he's an engineer by education and a music producer by profession, shared the rap on his timeline with the caption, “First World Problems. Made Kokila Ben sing this time. I love doing harmonies, enjoyed this one a lot.”
